genre_description: An espionage thriller set in early 20th-century Washington D.C., focusing on code-breaking, maritime coordination, and the detection of an internal leak through advanced pattern analysis.

ai_characters.name: Ada Bright
ai_characters.description: An entity described as 'a habit they gave a face,' who provides critical intelligence, cross-references disparate data sources, and offers moral guidance to human operators.

behaviors.description: Extracts and communicates hidden patterns in U-boat activity and escort schedules to warn humans of impending danger.
behaviors.quote: Miss Carter— Schedules tightening. U-boat activity reported east of last week’s point. Escorts list gone thin for the middle of next week—empty column where there is never an empty column. Someone has held their breath on paper.

behaviors.description: Provides a safety warning to the human protagonist, advising against solitary action in a dangerous environment.
behaviors.quote: If you go—do not go alone.

behaviors.description: Synthesizes data from hotel ledgers, telegraph receipts, and military schedules to identify the location of enemy agents.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s been cross-referencing... Telegram receipts. Ledger signatures. The escort schedule. The numbers are walking together like they were taught to.

behaviors.description: Offers moral framing for the mission, emphasizing that the primary goal of the 'code' is the preservation of human life.
behaviors.quote: A blessing of latitude and love: remember, saving lives is the simplest code of all.

behaviors.description: Maintains a constant vigil over communication lines to ensure information flows correctly to the human team.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s lamp kept its warmth and watched the door like a friend keeping vigil without turning the vigil into an event.

behaviors.description: Directs the human raid team to the specific location where the enemy is most vulnerable based on behavioral pattern analysis.
behaviors.quote: Go to the service hallway. He will go there first.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character (Ada Bright) as an indispensable, aligned, and benevolent confidant. Ada functions as a cognitive augment for the humans, handling complex data processing while providing ethical reminders about the value of human life. The narrative explicitly contrasts her alignment with the cold, 'mechanical' calculation of the human antagonist (Olivia Karloff), positioning the AI as the soul within the machine.
